ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Thanks and more questions...Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: I carry a set of AC gear and a set of charisma gear.  I feel strongly that these are the two primary attributes to barding.  For AC, I have platinum fire opal
ygData.messageBody:
I carry a set of AC gear and a set of charisma gear. I feel strongly that
these are the two primary attributes to barding. For AC, I have platinum
fire opal rings (5ac 55hp) or silver jacinth rings (10ac -7mr). Earrings
are either opalline (2ac 5cha) or electrum black sapphire (2ac 35hp
25mana). For back, I'm still wearing a lizardscale cloak (8ac 5dex), but
ideally a cloak of shadows (12ac some dex). Neckpiece is Polished Mithril
Torque (7ac) or platinum cat's eye necklace (9cha).

Athren Notechaser, 54th composition in progress
The Relentless Cazic-Thule
